targets.rawSql: SELECT NAME,dialActive,dialMethod,dialOriginateCallerIdNumber,id FROM voice_queues WHERE TYPE='outbound' order by NAME ASC

SELECT 
	COUNT(a.userId) AS 'value',
	b.name AS 'metric'
FROM 
	user_has_voice_queues a,
	voice_queues b
WHERE 
	a.VoiceQueueId = b.id
	and b.type='outbound'
GROUP BY 
	metric
ORDER BY metric ASC

SELECT 
  now() as 'time_sec',
	Count(dialMethod) AS 'value',
	dialMethod AS 'metric'
FROM 
	voice_queues 
WHERE 
	type='outbound'
GROUP BY 
	metric

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
  count(online) as 'value'
FROM 
  users
WHERE
  online=1

SELECT
  name AS "login",
  fullname as "user"
FROM 
  users
WHERE
  online='1'
  and role='agent'

SELECT 
  now() as 'time_sec',
	Count(dialActive) AS 'value',
	CASE
	 WHEN dialActive='1' THEN 'Active'
	 ELSE 'Inactive'
	END AS 'metric'
FROM 
	voice_queues 
WHERE 
	type='outbound'
GROUP BY 
	metric

SELECT 
  now() as 'time_sec',
	Count(dialActive) AS 'value',
	CASE
	 WHEN dialActive='1' THEN 'Active'
	 ELSE 'Inactive'
	END AS 'metric'
FROM 
	voice_queues 
WHERE 
	type='outbound'
GROUP BY 
	metric

SELECT 
	NOW() AS 'time_sec',
	COUNT(a.voicequeueid) AS 'value',
	b.name AS 'metric'
FROM
	cm_hopper_final a,
	voice_queues b
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(a.starttime)
	AND LCASE(a.disposition) = 'acepta contrato'
	AND a.VoiceQueueId = b.id
GROUP BY
	metric;

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
  count(id) as 'value'
FROM 
  cm_hopper_final
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(starttime)
  AND lcase(disposition)='acepta contrato'

SELECT 
	NOW() AS 'time_sec',
	COUNT(disposition) AS 'value',
	disposition AS 'metric'
FROM
	cm_hopper_final
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(starttime)
	AND disposition IS NOT null
GROUP BY
	metric;

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
  count(id) as 'value'
FROM 
  cm_hopper_final
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(starttime)

SELECT 
	now() as 'time_sec',
	Count(VoiceQueueId) AS 'value',
	b.name AS 'metric'
FROM 
	cm_hopper_history a,
	voice_queues b
WHERE 
	$__timeFilter(starttime)
	AND a.voiceQueueId = b.id
GROUP BY metric

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
  count(id) as 'value'
FROM 
  cm_hopper_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(starttime)

SELECT 
	NOW() AS 'time_sec',
	COUNT(statedesc) AS 'value',
	statedesc AS 'metric'
FROM 
	cm_hopper_history
WHERE 
	$__timeFilter(starttime)
GROUP BY time_sec, metric

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
  count(id) as 'value'
FROM 
  cm_hopper_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(starttime) and state = 4

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
  count(id) as 'value'
FROM 
  cm_hopper_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(starttime) and state != 4

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
  count(id)
FROM cm_hopper

SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  COUNT(a.voicequeueid) AS 'value',
  b.name AS metric
FROM 
	cm_hopper a,
	voice_queues b
WHERE
	a.voicequeueid=b.id
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY metric ASC

SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  COUNT(a.voicequeueid) AS 'value',
  b.name AS metric
FROM 
	cm_hopper a,
	voice_queues b
WHERE
	a.voicequeueid=b.id
	and a.active = 0
  and a.countbusyretry = 0
  and a.countcongestionretry = 0
  and a.countnoanswerretry = 0
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY metric ASC

SELECT
  now() as time,
  count(id)
FROM cm_hopper
WHERE
    active = 0
  and
    countbusyretry = 0
  and
    countcongestionretry = 0
  and
    countnoanswerretry = 0

SELECT
  COUNT(a.listid) AS 'value',
  b.name AS metric
FROM 
	cm_hopper a,
	cm_lists b
WHERE
	a.listid=b.id
GROUP BY metric

SELECT
  COUNT(a.listid) AS 'value',
  b.name AS metric
FROM 
	cm_hopper a,
	cm_lists b
WHERE
	a.listid=b.id
	and a.active = 0
  and a.countbusyretry = 0
  and a.countcongestionretry = 0
  and a.countnoanswerretry = 0
GROUP BY metric
